item.title: Home Resume
item.dc:creator: exporter
item.content:encoded: [vc_row type="color" bg_color="#ffc107" vertical_align="yes" padding_top="100px" padding_bottom="0" parallax_image="32464"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="I CRAFT DIGITAL DESIGNS AND WEBSITES." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="20px"][kleo_button title="View my profile" href="#hello" style="see-through" size="lg" el_class="kleo-scroll-to"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="6351" img_size="500x630" alignment="right" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="120px" padding_bottom="120px" el_class="dark col"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="HELLO. NICE TO MEET YOU." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="40px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="My name is John Doe. I am a Spanish Digital Designer & Developer, focusing on Graphic Design and Web Design." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|line_height:44px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="20px"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]I am currently working as a full time Graphic and Web Designer at Lorem Ipsum - Perspiciatis, a small but successful design agency in Spain. Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. You can follow me on Twitter, stalk me on Dribbble, listen to me on SoundCloud or just send me an Email.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="View selected work" style="see-through" size="lg"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type="alternate" type="color" padding_top="120px" padding_bottom="0" parallax_image="32464"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="DIGITAL DESIGN SERIES." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]To go along with my design skills, my toolbox is filled with acronyms you might be afraid of such as HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and LESS. I love to see new standards appear and mature allowing the creation of new websites, each one more advanced and amazing than the previous. Page loading speed, display performance, responsive layout and SEO optimizations are part of my job, I take these issues at heart from the very beginning.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="40px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" section_type="alternate" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0"][vc_column][vc_media_grid style="pagination" items_per_page="4" element_width="3" gap="0" arrows_design="vc_arrow-icon-arrow_05_left" arrows_color="white" paging_design="none" loop="yes" autoplay="10" item="mediaGrid_ScaleWithRotation" filter_size="md" include="6369,6366,6365,6363,6362,6361,6360,6359" paging_animation_in="none" grid_id="vc_gid:1489077850057-cab8de87-671c-1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type="alternate" padding_top="120px" padding_bottom="0" parallax_image="32464"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="PIXEL PERFECT WEBSITES." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]To go along with my design skills, my toolbox is filled with acronyms you might be afraid of such as HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and LESS. I love to see new standards appear and mature allowing the creation of new websites, each one more advanced and amazing than the previous. Page loading speed, display performance, responsive layout and SEO optimizations are part of my job, I take these issues at heart from the very beginning.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap lead="yes"]If you like to learn more about my thoughts and motivations, you can add me on one or all of the following sites.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="20px"][kleo_button title="Follow me on
